page.title: 11LEISURE IN MARLPOOL
page.content: There are no sports or leisure clubs in Marlpool. Heanor Sports Centre is about a mile away. We did a survey on the use of the centre. We asked seventy of the children in Coppice School. 61 of them use it. 25 people go more than once a week. 24 people go once a week.7 people go once a month.5 less often. 54 people approve of the centre. We also asked people what other things they do in their spare time, a majority of people liked riding their bikes, fishing and watching television. Others like art, music,playing football. Shipley Country Park is also nearby. Of 70 children asked 25 go there daily, 28 once a week, 25 once a month. The rest less often.75% of them go for a walk, 36% for a picnic 25% to fish and a few to play football or jog.There are some greens to play on and some swings
